short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides posts of users you have muted on BBI's Corner Forum.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Big Blue Interactive's Corner Forum is a New York Giants discussion board. This extension gives users the ability to hide the posts of users by clicking a "mute" button next to that user's username. This makes it easier to ignore users that negatively impact their experience on the forum. Muted users can be unmuted from the extension's menu.

This is a fan made extension and is not affiliated with Big Blue Interactive.
